channel.title: Novint Falcon Support is coming.
channel.description:
[url='https://www.google.com/url?q=https://home.novint.com/products/novint_falcon.php&ei=KogqSvqULNLBtwfM6Jz3Cw&sa=X&oi=smap&resnum=1&ct=result&cd=1&usg=AFQjCNETOf0PFb4WCNtV2JfxT_1ToGrX3w\']The Novint Falcon[/url]
[url='https://arstechnica.com/gaming/news/2009/01/left-4-dead-novint-falcon-support-coming-soon.ars']Valve looking at a patch for L4D to support the Novint Falcon.[/url]
[url='https://i91.photobucket.com/albums/k296/Medevila/betanovintfalcon.jpg']Beta participation.[/url]
I hadn't heard of the Noving Falcon until after doing some research when I saw the beta open on Steam.
